text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Il-Belt Valletta |official_name = Humilissima Civitas Valletta |other_name = Ċittà Umilissima |native_name = |nickname = Il-Belt |settlement_type = City and Local council |total_type = |motto = Città Umilissima |image_skyline = The Dome of the Carmelite Church in Valletta, Malta.jpg |imagesize = 280px |image_caption = Valletta skyline |image_flag = Flag of Valletta, Malta.svg |image_shield = Valletta_coa.svg |image_map = Valletta-map.svg |mapsize = |map_caption = Location within Malta |pushpin_map = |pushpin_label_position = none |pushpin_map_caption = |pushpin_mapsize = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = Malta |subdivision_type1 = Island |subdivision_name1 = Malta |subdivision_type2 = District |subdivision_name2 = |seat_type = |seat = |parts_type = Borders |parts_style = para |p1 = |leader_title = Mayor |leader_name = Alexiei Dingli |leader_party = PN |established_title = |established_date = |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 =0.8 |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m =56 |elevation_max_m = |elevation_min_m = |population_as_of =December 2008 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total =6098 |population_density_km2 =auto |population_demonym =Belti (m), Beltija (f), Beltin (pl) |timezone = CET |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = CEST |utc_offset_DST = +2 |coordinates = |postal_code_type = Postal code |postal_code = VLT |area_code_type = Dialing code |area_code = 356 |blank_name = Patron Saints |blank_info = Saint Dominic, Our Lady of Mount Carmel, Saint Paul, Saint Augustine |blank1_name = Feast Days |blank1_info = August 3 & February 10 |website = |footnotes = }} Valletta is the capital city of Malta. It was founded by Jean Parisot de la Valette, the Grandmaster of the Order of Saint John on March 28, 1566. The city's population is 6,315 (in 2005) and it is currently decreasing as people move to the UK, Italy, or the newer areas of Malta. ==Other websites== Category:National capitals in Europe Category:Cities in Malta
title: Valletta
